mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into file (fileId, fileName, rawFilePath, readyFilePath, genTime, fileFormat, fileSize, isConverted, md5Value, fileBelong, isDelete, createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy ) values (#{fileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rawfilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readyfilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fileformat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isconverted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{md5value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filebelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update file set fileId = #{fileid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rawFilePath = #{rawfilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, readyFilePath = #{readyfilepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, genTime = #{gentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fileFormat = #{fileformat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileSize = #{filesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isConverted = #{isconverted,jdbcType=CHAR}, md5Value = #{md5value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileBelong = #{filebelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isDelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, fileId, fileName, rawFilePath, readyFilePath, genTime, fileFormat, fileSize, isConverted, md5Value, fileBelong, isDelete, createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy from file where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, fileId, fileName, rawFilePath, readyFilePath, genTime, fileFormat, fileSize, isConverted, md5Value, fileBelong, isDelete, createTime, createBy, updateTime, updateBy from file
